channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Michael Dell just saw a $1.2 billion surge in his wealth thanks to a stock sale—but it’s not shaken the billionaires club
item.description: The Dell CEO and founder now boasts a net worth of $138 billion, just $1 billion shy of overtaking Jensen Huang for the number 10 spot on the ultra-ri...

item.title: Another of Putin’s ministers allegedly commits suicide—he was abruptly fired hours before
AI can make anyone rich: Mark Cuban says it could turn ‘just one dude in a basement’ into a trillionaire
item.description: The billionaire Shark Tank star and former Dallas Mavericks owner is a dedicated AI user.

item.title: Trump slaps 25% tariffs on Japan and South Korea—and Wall Street stumbles
item.description: The tariffs target two of America’s closest allies and key suppliers of autos, electronics, and steel.

item.title: Strategy posts $14 billion unrealized gain in second quarter
item.description: This is the first week the company formerly known as MicroStrategy Inc. has not purchased additional tokens since April.
